alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 1:01PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Gulf, southwestern Wakulla, southern Liberty and north central Franklin Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 101 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northwest of Carrabelle, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange, East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Morgan Place, Vilas, Jensen Place, Central City, Sanborn, Owens Bridge, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek, Kern, Wilma, Sumatra, Nixon Garden, Twin Pole and Fort Gadsden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
